issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A big user story that needs to be broken down. Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete.
issuetype.name: Epic

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Per AWS EC2 Instance Metadata documentation:

http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/AESDG-chapter-instancedata.html#instancedata-data-categories

*Dynamic Data*

Amazon EC2 instances can also include dynamic data. Dynamic data is retrieved from http://169.254.169.254/latest/dynamic/:

*_fws/instance-monitoring_*	_Value showing whether the customer has enabled detailed 1-minute monitoring in CloudWatch._
Valid values: *_enabled | disabled_*	*_2009-04-04_*
fields.summary: Support for Dynamic data in EC2 instances

comments.body:
This is critical now that AWS ECS agent uses dynamic data to retrieve instance attributes and register itself to the ECS cluster. In future when Eucalyptus implements AWS ECS we would like AWS ECS agent to work seamlessely in Eucalyptus as well.

Current ECS Agent code highlighting the checks done using the Dynamic data:

https://github.com/aws/amazon-ecs-agent/blob/master/agent/agent.go#L100-L104
https://github.com/aws/amazon-ecs-agent/blob/master/agent/ec2/ec2_metadata_client.go#L26-L60

We now support the dynamic categories for metadata:

http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/ec2-instance-metadata.html#dynamic-data-categories

specifically:

{code}
#
# curl -s http://169.254.169.254/latest/dynamic/fws/instance-monitoring; echo
enabled
#
#
{code}

and:

{code}
#
# curl -s http://169.254.169.254/latest/dynamic/instance-identity/document; echo
{
  "privateIp": "10.111.76.246",
  "devpayProductCodes": null,
  "availabilityZone": "one",
  "version": "2010-08-31",
  "region": "eucalyptus",
  "instanceId": "i-a493c729",
  "billingProducts": null,
  "instanceType": "m1.small",
  "accountId": "000139185119",
  "pendingTime": "2016-02-29T06:04:01Z",
  "imageId": "emi-62606d65",
  "architecture": "x86_64",
  "kernelId": null,
  "ramdiskId": null
}
#
#
{code}

dynamic metadata also includes "pkcs7" and "signature" under "instance-identity". The PKCS7 signed data can be validated using the eucalyptus certificate as per AWS docs:

http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/instance-identity-documents.html#instance-identity-signature-verification-example

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.3.0-0.25026.353.20160711git783d0ca.el7}}

*Testing Environment YAML*

{code}
default_attributes:
  eucalyptus:
    default-img-url: http://images.objectstorage.cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/precise-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.img
    dns:
      domain: c-16.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
    enterprise-repo: http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/yum/tags/enterprise-devel/centos/7/x86_64/
    euca2ools-repo: http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/yum/tags/euca2ools-devel/centos/7/x86_64/
    eucalyptus-repo: http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/yum/tags/eucalyptus-devel/centos/7/x86_64/
    imaging-vm-type: m1.medium
    init-script-url: http://git.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/qa-repos/eucalele/raw/master/deploy-helpers/scripts/network-interfaces.sh
    install-service-image: 'true'
    install-type: packages
    nc:
      max-cores: 32
    network:
      bridge-interface: br0
      bridged-nic: em1
      config-json:
        Clusters:
        - Name: collegrove
          PrivateIps:
          - 10.111.30.91
          - 10.111.30.92
          - 10.111.30.93
          - 10.111.30.95
          - 10.111.30.96
          - 10.111.30.97
          - 10.111.30.98
          - 10.111.30.99
          Subnet:
            Gateway: 10.111.0.1
            Name: 10.111.0.0
            Netmask: 255.255.0.0
            Subnet: 10.111.0.0
        InstanceDnsServers: &id001
        - 10.111.1.51
        Mode: EDGE
        PublicIps:
        - 10.111.30.66
        - 10.111.30.68
        - 10.111.30.69
        - 10.111.30.86
        - 10.111.30.87
        - 10.111.30.88
        - 10.111.30.89
        - 10.111.30.90
      dns-server: 10.111.1.51
      mode: EDGE
      nc-router: N
      private-interface: br0
      public-interface: br0
    source-branch: master
    source-repo: ssh://repo-euca@git.eucalyptus-systems.com/internal
    system-properties:
      cloud.euca_log_level: DEBUG
      cloudformation.url_domain_whitelist: '*s3.amazonaws.com, git.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com'
      collegrove.storage.cephconfigfile: /etc/ceph/ceph.conf
      collegrove.storage.cephkeyringfile: /etc/ceph/ceph.client.demouser.keyring
      collegrove.storage.cephsnapshotpools: eucaqa
      collegrove.storage.cephuser: demouser
      collegrove.storage.cephvolumepools: eucaqa
      objectstorage.dogetputoncopyfail: 'true'
      objectstorage.s3provider.s3endpointheadresponse: 200
    topology:
      ceph-config:
        global:
          auth-client-required: cephx
          auth-cluster-required: cephx
          auth-service-required: cephx
          cluster-network: 10.107.0.0/16
          filestore-xattr-use-omap: 'true'
          fsid: 827b5d53-ac88-4079-a452-0e18aeb16fb8
          mon-host: 10.111.5.121
          mon-initial-members: g-15-07
          osd-journal-size: 10240
          osd-pool-default-min size: 1
          osd-pool-default-pg-num: 128
          osd-pool-default-pgp-num: 128
          osd-pool-default-size: 3
          public-network: 10.111.0.0/16
        mon.g-12-09:
          host: g-12-09
          mon addr: 10.111.5.124:6789
        mon.g-15-07:
          host: g-15-07
          mon addr: 10.111.5.121:6789
        mon.g-26-09:
          host: g-26-09
          mon addr: 10.111.5.129:6789
      ceph-keyrings:
        ceph-admin:
          caps mds: allow
          caps mon: allow *
          caps osd: allow *
          key: AQA+xeFWMSK7MxAA9sj2bI0LvBWVh4BW0vODvg==
          keyring: /etc/ceph/ceph.client.admin.keyring
          name: client.admin
        radosgw:
          caps mon: allow rwx
          caps osd: allow rwx
          key: AQBUxv1Wuvp4LxAA22EdB8f8aks4mT2TmtJOHg==
          keyring: /etc/ceph/ceph.client.radosgw.keyring
          name: client.radosgw.euca-osg
      ceph-radosgw:
        endpoint: localhost:7480
        keyring: /etc/ceph/ceph.client.radosgw.keyring
        log file: /var/log/ceph/radosgw.log
        name: client.radosgw.euca-osg
        rgw frontends: civetweb port=7480
        username: hspencer-4518
      clc-1: 10.111.5.161
      clusters:
        collegrove:
          cc-1: 10.111.1.100
          ceph_cluster:
            ceph_config:
              global:
                auth-client-required: cephx
                auth-cluster-required: cephx
                auth-service-required: cephx
                cluster-network: 10.107.0.0/16
                filestore-xattr-use-omap: 'true'
                fsid: 827b5d53-ac88-4079-a452-0e18aeb16fb8
                mon-host: 10.111.5.121
                mon-initial-members: g-15-07
                osd-journal-size: 10240
                osd-pool-default-min size: 1
                osd-pool-default-pg-num: 128
                osd-pool-default-pgp-num: 128
                osd-pool-default-size: 3
                public-network: 10.111.0.0/16
              mon.g-12-09:
                host: g-12-09
                mon addr: 10.111.5.124:6789
              mon.g-15-07:
                host: g-15-07
                mon addr: 10.111.5.121:6789
              mon.g-26-09:
                host: g-26-09
                mon addr: 10.111.5.129:6789
            ceph_user: demouser
            keyring:
              key: AQC+0uFWvfFyORAAtkXPyq2hfBtw64m+Sc8GNQ==
          nodes: 10.111.1.119
          sc-1: 10.111.1.100
          storage-backend: ceph-rbd
      user-facing: *id001
    yum-options: --nogpg
description: Eucalyptus CI Testing
name: hspencer-4518
{code}

*Test Steps*

# Launched 2 instances (based off of Ubuntu Xenial cloud image); one with monitoring enabled, the other with monitoring disabled.
{code}
[root@g-12-12 ~]# euca-run-instances -k euca-admin -t m1.medium --monitor emi-a39a50d9
RESERVATION	r-152b4a01	000156122136	default
INSTANCE	i-39a7681a	emi-a39a50d9	euca-10-111-30-68.eucalyptus.c-16.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-10-111-30-97.eucalyptus.internal	pending	euca-admin	0	m1.medium	2016-07-13T02:37:17.883Z	collegrove				monitoring-enabled	10.111.30.68	10.111.30.97			instance-store			hvm			sg-bef7ca3b				x86_64
[root@g-12-12 ~]# euca-run-instances -k euca-admin -t m1.medium  emi-a39a50d9
RESERVATION	r-e6119f57	000156122136	default
INSTANCE	i-770a20b0	emi-a39a50d9	euca-10-111-30-69.eucalyptus.c-16.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-10-111-30-93.eucalyptus.internal	pending	euca-admin	0	m1.medium	2016-07-13T02:37:24.456Z	collegrove				monitoring-disabled	10.111.30.69	10.111.30.93			instance-store			hvm			sg-bef7ca3b				x86_64
[root@g-12-12 ~]# euca-describe-instances
RESERVATION	r-e6119f57	000156122136	default
INSTANCE	i-770a20b0	emi-a39a50d9	euca-10-111-30-69.eucalyptus.c-16.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-10-111-30-93.eucalyptus.internal	running	euca-admin	0	m1.medium	2016-07-13T02:37:24.456Z	collegrove				monitoring-disabled	10.111.30.69	10.111.30.93			instance-store			hvm			sg-bef7ca3b				x86_64
TAG	instance	i-770a20b0	euca:node	10.111.1.119
RESERVATION	r-152b4a01	000156122136	default
INSTANCE	i-39a7681a	emi-a39a50d9	euca-10-111-30-68.eucalyptus.c-16.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-10-111-30-97.eucalyptus.internal	running	euca-admin	0	m1.medium	2016-07-13T02:37:17.883Z	collegrove				monitoring-enabled	10.111.30.68	10.111.30.97			instance-store			hvm			sg-bef7ca3b				x86_64
TAG	instance	i-39a7681a	euca:node	10.111.1.119
{code}
